sub_title: Create and manage lands and plots for insurance coverage
welcome_back_message: Welcome back! Here's what's happening with your insurance operations.
search_placeholder: Search by land name or farmer name...
create_first_land_entry: Create your first land entry to get started
premium_description: Unlock the full power of the app with a Premium subscription. Enjoy exclusive features, faster performance, and tools designed to help you get the most out of your usage.
create_manage_land_entries: Create and manage land entries for insurance coverage.
enter_plot_name: Enter plot name (e.g., North Field A)
enter_name_for_land_plot: Please enter a name for your land plot.
enter_valid_numeric_sw_se: Please enter a valid numeric value (meters) for SW → SE.
enter_valid_numeric_sw_nw: Please enter a valid numeric value (meters) for SW → NW.
select_farmer_from_list: Please select a farmer from the dropdown list to proceed.
check_coordinates_valid: Please check that all coordinates are valid (lat: -90 to 90, lng: -180 to 180).
crop_plot_processed: Your crop plot has been processed and is ready for review.
added_to_plots: has been added to your plots.
failed_to_generate_plot: Failed to generate plot. Please try again.
network_error_saving: Network or server error while saving land
geolocation_not_supported: Geolocation is not supported by your browser.
unable_retrieve_location: Unable to retrieve location. Please allow location access.
